name: Onion Roasted Potatoes
author: Donna Stamp

ingredients.name: envelope Lipton Onion Recipe Soup Mix
lb. all purpose potatoes, cut into large chunks

instructions: Preheat oven to 450Â°. In large plastic bowl or bag, add all ingredients. Close bag and shake, or toss in bowl, until potatoes are evenly coated. Empty potatoes into shallow baking or roasting pan; discard bag. Bake, stirring occasionally, 40 minutes. Or until potatoes are tender and golden brown. Garnish, if desired, with chopped parsley.
